name: crazymikesapps.com
overview: www.crazymikesapps.com is website dedicated to provide informative, entertaining, relevant, honest reviews of Apple iPhone/iPod touch applications, iPhone/iPod touch accessories, and the latest cutting edge gadgets. This website is dedicated to informing consumers with pithy spot on reviews of above said products. Additionally, I will be helping iPhone application developers to get more media coverage for their developed applications. Since, the iTunes store is just about the only means of advertising for developers I am trying to be another voice for these individuals. Lastly, I love gadgets and I will continue to seek out the latest, craziest, unusual, and useful gadgets to review. I am not perfect and if I make a mistake please let me know through email at Mike so I can rectify the mistake.
